radiographic_examinations.findings: Fat mass, lean mass, and bone mineral content were determined.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Total fat mass decreased from 34.3 kg at the start of the trial to 18.4 kg during the first 48 months of therapy; the percentage of body fat decreased from 53.4% to 38.1%. Body mass index decreased from 43.4 to 24.2 kg/m2.
